content: As an AI language model, I can make educated guesses based on past occurrences and common practices. Typically, increases in police officer patrols happen in response to spikes in crime rates or public safety concerns. It's possible that the city government of Atlantic City is considering increasing the number of police officers on patrol if there has been a recent increase in crime or a rise in public safety concerns. However, it is always best to check with local officials or news sources for the most accurate and up-to-date information on this matter.
